name: Full_Power_Coverage_017
title: Full Power Coverage Redux
author: Morhe, SnowDrifter, SirTony + Others
description: Makes the supply area for small and medium electric poles match their wire reach, so that you can get full coverage from drag-building power poles. Slightly reduces connection range to force connection ranges to odd numbers of tiles, then raises power coverage range to match. Compatible with Bob's Power and Factorissimo.
